mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.order_number , t1.contract_amount , t1.product_type , t1.repayment_method , t1.approval_period , t1.if_transfer , t1.examine_remarks , t1.fuyi_remarks , t1.creation_time , t1.update_time , t1.FUYI_AMOUNT, t1.FUYI_PERIOD from car_loan_reconsideration t1 where 1=1 and t1.ORDER_NUMBER = #{ordernum}

select t1.id , t1.order_number , t1.contract_amount , t1.product_type , t1.repayment_method , t1.approval_period , t1.if_transfer , t1.examine_remarks , t1.fuyi_remarks , t1.creation_time , t1.update_time from car_loan_reconsideration t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update car_loan_reconsideration t1 set t1.id =#{dto.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.order_number =#{dto.orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.contract_amount =#{dto.contractAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.product_type =#{dto.productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.repayment_method =#{dto.repaymentMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.approval_period =#{dto.approvalPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.if_transfer =#{dto.ifTransfer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.examine_remarks =#{dto.examineRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.fuyi_remarks =#{dto.fuyiRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.creation_time =#{dto.creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.update_time =#{dto.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from car_loan_reconsideration where id in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update car_loan_reconsideration t1 set t1.valid='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.order_number , t1.contract_amount , t1.product_type , t1.repayment_method , t1.approval_period , t1.if_transfer , t1.examine_remarks , t1.fuyi_remarks , t1.creation_time , t1.update_time from car_loan_reconsideration t1 where t1.order_number = #{orderNum}
mapper.update: update car_loan_reconsideration t1 set t1.AUDITE_STATE =#{dto.auditeState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.OPERATE_USER =#{dto.operateUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.update_time =CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where t1.id = #{dto.id}
